customer.id.description: The unique ID of the customer.

customer.descriptive_name.description: The name or description of the customer.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign the keyword belongs to.

ad_group.id.description: The ID of the ad group the keyword belongs to.

ad_group_criterion.type.description: The type of the ad group criterion (e.g., keyword, placement).

ad_group_criterion.keyword.text.description: The actual text of the keyword.

ad_group_criterion.negative.description: Specifies whether the keyword is a negative keyword.

ad_group_criterion.keyword.match_type.description: The match type of the keyword (e.g., exact, broad, phrase).

metrics.historical_quality_score.description: The historical quality score of the keyword.

metrics.ctr.description: The click-through rate (clicks divided by impressions) for the keyword.

segments.date.description: The date when the data was recorded.

campaign.bidding_strategy_type.description: The type of bidding strategy used for the campaign.

metrics.clicks.description: The number of clicks on the keyword.

metrics.cost_micros.description: The cost of the keyword advertising in micros.

metrics.impressions.description: The number of times the keyword was displayed.

metrics.active_view_measurability.description: The ratio of viewable impressions to the number of measurable impressions.

metrics.active_view_measurable_cost_micr.description: The cost for measurable viewable impressions in micros.

metrics.active_view_measurable_impressio.description: The number of impressions that were measurable for viewability.

metrics.active_view_viewability.description: The ratio of viewable impressions to measurable impressions.

metrics.conversions.description: The number of conversions attributed to the keyword.

metrics.conversions_value.description: The total value of conversions attributed to the keyword.

metrics.interactions.description: The total number of interactions (clicks, video views, etc.) on the keyword.

metrics.interaction_event_types.description: The types of interactions that occurred (e.g., click, video view).

items.description: A specific type of interaction (e.g., click).

metrics.view_through_conversions.description: The number of conversions that occurred after a view of the ad without a click.

ad_group_criterion.criterion_id.description: The unique ID of the ad group criterion.

metrics.all_conversions_value_per_cost.description: The average value of all conversions attributed to the keyword per cost.

metrics.average_cpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions for the keyword.

metrics.average_cpv.description: The average cost per view for the keyword.

metrics.conversions_value_per_cost.description: The average value of conversions attributed to the keyword per cost.

metrics.phone_calls.description: The number of phone calls made to the keyword.

metrics.conversions_by_conversion_date.description: Conversion date metric for the campaign.

metrics.all_conversions_by_conversion_da.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group.

metrics.all_conversions_value_by_convers.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group, including all conversions.

metrics.search_absolute_top_impression_s.description: The percentage of impressions that were shown in the search results for the keyword.

metrics.value_per_conversions_by_convers.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group, including value per conversion.

metrics.search_rank_lost_absolute_top_im.description: The percentage of impressions that were lost in the search results for the keyword.

metrics.search_budget_lost_absolute_top_.description: The percentage of impressions that were lost in the search budget for the keyword.

metrics.search_budget_lost_top_impressio.description: The percentage of impressions that were lost in the search budget for the keyword.

metrics.search_click_share.description: The percentage of clicks that were made to the keyword.

metrics.revenue_micros.description: The total revenue generated by the keyword.

metrics.all_conversions.description: Total number of conversions for all campaigns.

metrics.all_conversions_value.description: Total value of conversions for all campaigns.

metrics.cost_per_all_conversions.description: Cost per all conversions in the campaign.

metrics.cost_per_conversion.description: Cost per conversion in the campaign.

metrics.engagement_rate.description: Engagement rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.engagements.description: Total number of engagements in the campaign.

metrics.gmail_forwards.description: Total number of Gmail forwards in the campaign.

metrics.gmail_saves.description: Total number of Gmail saves in the campaign.

metrics.interaction_rate.description: Interaction rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.video_quartile_p100_rate.description: Video quartile 100 rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.video_quartile_p25_rate.description: Video quartile 25 rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.video_quartile_p50_rate.description: Video quartile 50 rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.video_quartile_p75_rate.description: Video quartile 75 rate metric for the campaign.

metrics.video_views.description: Total number of video views in the campaign.

metrics.search_impression_share.description: Search impression share metric for the campaign.

metrics.average_cpc.description: Average cost per click in the campaign.

metrics.conversions_value_by_conversion_.description: Conversion date metric for conversions in the campaign.

metrics.value_per_conversion.description: Average value per conversion in the campaign.

metrics.search_rank_lost_impression_shar.description: Search rank lost impression share metric for the campaign.

metrics.search_exact_match_impression_sh.description: Search exact match impression share metric for the campaign.
